Class AScene

java.lang.Object
GameFiles.Scenes.AScene
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminScene, ConnectionScene, DatabaseConnectionScene, ForumScene, QuizzScene, SearchScene, TeacherScene
public abstract class AScene extends Object
Classe abstraite

Definit l'ensemble des methodes de base concernant les differentes scenes

Maxime Emonnot
